title: gemstateio-groups
description: Schema for Idaho tech creative group list

fields.name: FirstAddedDate
fields.description: Date the group was first added to this list, intended to help people find new groups (ISO 8601 format)

fields.name: TLA
fields.description: Acronym used by the group to self-identify, e.g. Boise Software Developers Group members call it BSDG. Looking for scenario.

fields.name: Locality
fields.description: Locality (incorporated city or town) of the group's in-person meetings, or 'Online' if there is no in-person meeting

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A brief text description of the group. No HTML/links please. (We'll provide for linking later. See NextMeetingURL.)

fields.name: Frequency
fields.description: Recurrence of meetings in English, e.g. 'August' or '1st Thursday'

fields.name: Recurrence
fields.description: Recurrence of meetings, if known and expressable in RFC 2445 notation. Looking for scenario (likely iCal integration, but need frequent updates first.)

fields.name: NextMeetingURL
fields.description: Most specific URL possible to get information about the next upcoming meeting
